Hello Ulf,

With the default logging configuration as shipped, messages log=
ged
with logger.severe() should appear in heritrix_out and in the job log.
=
Are you sure logger.severe() is being called and that nothing appears
in th=
e logs?

Noah

On Tue, Apr 15, 2014 at 5:47 AM, el Backo <e_backo@...=
> wrote:
>
>
> Hi
>
> I have some question about logging information.
>
> I=
 want to see the result of HtmlFormCredential (the call logger.severe("")
>=
 ), how do I configure that this information is logged?
>
>
> Logs referenc=
es to http://logging.apache.org/log4j/ that uses xml-format for
> the use o=
f logging.
> The example of configuration file in heritrix (.../conf/loggin=
g.properties)
> do not use xml-format.
>
> If I want to see logs of HtmlFor=
mCredential, should I then add this in
> .../conf/logging.properties
> org.=
archive.modules.credentials.HtmlFormCredential.level =3D FINEST ?
>
> Best =
regards
> Ulf
